<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0"><info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated></info><citation>
    <layout>
      <group delimiter=". ">
        <text variable="title" quotes="true"/>
        <group delimiter=" ">
          <date variable="issued" form="text" date-parts="year" prefix="(" suffix=")"/>
          <text value="reference." font-style="italic"/>
        </group>
        <text value="blurble"/>
      </group>
    </layout></citation></style>
